entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the Potions master at Hogwarts school. He is described as standing back to allow Harry to pass him and is mentioned multiple times in the passage.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts school. He is described as having a new Patronus and is mentioned multiple times in the passage.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is a person who is present with Harry and Snape. She is described as looking shocked and angry when she sees Harry's new Patronus.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: Harry has a new Patronus which Snape thinks looks weak.

entities.name: potions master
entities.description: Snape is the Potions master at Hogwarts school.

relationships.description: Harry has a new Patronus which Snape thinks looks weak.
Snape thinks Harry's new Patronus looks weak.
